abstract: Showtime announces new Internet streaming service that will debut in July on Apple devices for $11 per month, and will include unlimited on-demand access original series.
lead_paragraph: The service will include unlimited on-demand access to the channel’s original series as well as hundreds of hours of movies and sports programming.

headline.main: Showtime to Introduce Net Streaming Service in July

snippet: The service will include unlimited on-demand access to the channel’s original series as well as hundreds of hours of movies and sports programming.
